Scheme for Assistance for Startups / Inn.details: Launched under the Gujarat Industrial Policy 2020, this scheme aims to support startups and innovations at various stages of the startup cycle. It provides financial assistance to encourage R&D and promote entrepreneurship.
benefits: Sustenance allowance of ₹20,000 per month for startups and ₹25,000 per month for women-led startups
Assistance for product development, marketing, and professional services
eligibility: Innovative startups recognized by the Startup Gujarat Cell
application_process: Apply through the official Startup Gujarat portal
Submit necessary documents and business plan
Await evaluation and approval by the designated committee

Aatmanirbhar Gujarat Scheme for assistan.details: This umbrella scheme launched by the Industries and Mines Department, Gujarat, aims to empower the state's dynamic MSME sector, which significantly contributes to employment, GDP, and exports. Effective from October 5, 2022, to October 4, 2027, this initiative supports growth, investments, and the vision of 'Aatmanirbhar Gujarat' and 'Aatmanirbhar Bharat'.
benefits: Financial assistance for technology upgradation and infrastructure development
Support for quality certification and patent registration
eligibility: Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs) operating in Gujarat
Enterprises meeting the criteria set by the Industries and Mines Department
application_process: Submit necessary documents and project details

Mukhyamantri Mahila Utkarsh Yojana.details: A scheme by the Government of Gujarat to promote women's entrepreneurship by providing interest-free loans up to ₹1 lakh to women entrepreneurs who wish to start a new business or expand their existing one.
benefits: Interest-free loans up to ₹1 lakh without any collateral security
Training and skill development programs for women entrepreneurs
eligibility: Applicants intending to start or expand a business
application_process: Apply through the official portal or designated centers

Scheme for Assistance to Micro, Small an.details: An umbrella scheme launched by the Industries and Mines Department, Gujarat, to empower the state's MSME sector. Effective from August 7, 2020, to August 6, 2025, it supports entrepreneurs and strengthens MSMEs, making them globally competitive.
benefits: Financial assistance for technology acquisition and quality certification
Support for patent registration and market development
eligibility: Enterprises meeting the criteria set by the Industries and Mines Department
application_process: Submit necessary documents and project details

Scheme for Assistance for Startups / Inn.details: Under Gujarat Venture Finance Limited (GVFL), this scheme provides mid-level Pre-Series A funding to startups, particularly those that have received seed support under various government schemes. It aims to bridge the financial gap known as the 'valley of death' in a startup's lifecycle.
benefits: Pre-Series A funding to eligible startups
Support for startups in the commercialization phase
eligibility: Startups that have received seed support under government schemes
application_process: Apply through the official GVFL portal
Submit necessary documents and business plan

Scheme for Assistance for Startups / Inn.details: This component provides financial support to startups with innovative ideas across various sectors. Approved startups are eligible for an additional interest subsidy of 1%, up to a maximum of 9%, on term loans for MSME assistance.
benefits: Interest subsidy up to 9% on term loans
Financial support for startups with innovative ideas
eligibility: Startups approved under the Scheme for Assistance for Startups / Innovation
application_process: Submit necessary documents and loan details
